scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i ./static/src/input.css -o ./static/css/main.css --minify && echo n | conda create --name cbquestenv python=3.12.3 && conda activate cbquestenv && pip install -r requirements.txt && pyinstaller -y "CB Quest Tracker".spec && cd ./dist && tar -acf "CB Quest Tracker.zip" "CB Quest Tracker"/_internal "CB Quest Tracker"/"CB Quest Tracker.exe" && rm -rf "CB Quest Tracker"
scripts.folder: npx tailwindcss -i ./static/src/input.css -o ./static/css/main.css --minify && echo n | conda create --name cbquestenv python=3.12.3 && conda activate cbquestenv && pip install -r requirements.txt && pyinstaller -y -w -D --name "CB Quest Tracker" --add-data "templates;templates" --add-data "static;static" --add-data "Tesseract-OCR;Tesseract-OCR" --hidden-import "engineio.async_drivers.gevent" --icon "logo.ico" CBQuestTracker.py && cd ./dist && tar -acf "CB Quest Tracker.zip" "CB Quest Tracker"/_internal "CB Quest Tracker"/"CB Quest Tracker.exe" && rm -rf "CB Quest Tracker"
